
                                        idR AAA mod brw wv  br  r   g   b   idL     
013 249 079 000 000 081 250 220 096 001 137 041 011 127 127 100 255 000 000 034 - Stehlampe
009 057 142 000 000 199 214 220 096 001 057 206 011 127 127 100 255 000 000 074 - Schrank
060 182 100 000 000 060 103 220 096 001 044 123 011 127 127 100 255 000 000 059 - Schreibtisch
018 126 121 000 000 199 057 220 096 001 089 135 011 127 127 100 255 000 000 075 - Backlight
024 102 059 000 000 157 242 220 096 001 140 137 011 127 127 100 255 000 000 081 - Decke

AAA: Seconds since the lamp was turned on (probably overflows back to 001) -> 000 means light went offline. (i think)

idL and idR are the last parts of the mac address of the devices.

0010 1001 - 41
1000 1001 - 137
0010 0010 - 34


0100 1010 1100 0001
0011 1000 0101 1011
0010 0010 1000 1001

0010 0010 1000 1001 - 8841
---

1100 1110 - 206
0011 1011 - 59

0100 1010 0011 1001 - 19001
---

0111 1011 - 123
0010 1100 - 44

0011 1011 0010 1100 - 15148
---

0101 1001 - 89
1000 0111 - 135

0100 1011 0101 1001 - 19289
---
